title: Typography Component
description: Learn about the typography styles and options available.

meta.title: LNGRZUI - Typography Component Documentation

content.overview-desc: The Typography page showcases the Typography component, which provides pre-defined text styles and typography options.
content.how-to-desc: Import the Typography component, and apply the desired typography styles to your text using the provided props.
